description: Jessy is a commander on a space station with 10 units of oxygen supply. Jessy can share some/all of this supply with Bob, a researcher who has a special device that can transform one unit of oxygen into three times the breathable air. Bob then decides how much transformed supply to return to Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of converted supply to station commander
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of converted supply to station commander
